name: Conventions of Love
description:
A WIP tutorial level for an upcoming dating sim. Play as Sophie, a young artist exhibiting her art for the first time at a major convention. Meet a variety of people, play a variety of games, and find yourself in the crazy world of expos and conventions. Explore the world of indie development, professional development, voice acting, cosplay, and more with interactions from a variety of eligible dates.

Still in development, but please feel free to play through what we have for the time being!
